channel.title: Need Help Changing Ip Of Server
channel.description:
EDIT: Thought I would include client help too instead of posting 2 different threads as they are both linked
1ST PROBLEM
What do I change the ip of source to if its on 0.0.0.0/where ? cant find it just like the client :confused: :confused:
2ND PROBLEM CHANGING IP OF CLIENT
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2w50jnp.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2ikps35.png[/img]
Don't have a clue :confused: :|
It's the Torvapkz V1 ( https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,495620.0.html ) & Its the first source and client link not version 2
Thanks guys.

item.title: Need Help Changing Ip Of Server
item.dc:creator: @Pk-Xile Pk-Xile
item.description:
@Pk-Xile wrote:

Sorted the source Just the client !

The ip the client is currently running on I CANT FIND IT

There is no server= is the file or server: or server- or whatever else , there is a client file ang GUI but i’ve checked the whole coding and I cant find it at all

Please help :palm:

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help Changing Ip Of Server

item.title: Need Help Changing Ip Of Server
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“chazion, post:2, topic:528872”]servers run on locahost because youre connecting to that computer or server through the client. If that makes sense. You only need to change ports on a server. As far as a the client you change the ip to connect to the server as well as have matching ports.

Search "server = " in client.java… and make sure to compile[/quote]
[b]
Go into client > client.java > ctrl + s > type server=

Change number to 127.0.0.1 < Local host no players can connect to or change to your ip address or no-ip setup.
i will create a video for basic Coding.[/b]

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help Changing Ip Of Server

item.title: Need Help Changing Ip Of Server
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

servers run on locahost because youre connecting to that computer or server through the client. If that makes sense. You only need to change ports on a server. As far as a the client you change the ip to connect to the server as well as have matching ports.

Search "server = " in client.java… and make sure to compile

Read full topic
